Name: MANUAL
checklistText:
1. Manual fuel handle - PULL DIRECT
2. ASCS switch - AUX or AUTO
3. RSCS switch - RATE COMD

If aux damping is desired
4. RSCS switch - AUTO

If aux damping is not desired
5. RSCS switch - RATE COMD

To return to the Auto ASCS control
6. ASCS switch - NORM
7. RSCS switch - AUTO
8. Manual fuel handle - PUSH RATE COMD
